name: Trial Of Empires TD
description:
Trial of Empires TD offers a detailed tower defense game far from simplicity to players. Progress your playstyle with your Army, Ally, Spell Upgrades, Target Detections, In-Game Buffs, Ammo System and more.

Ally

You can pick 14 allies from the real world and each have unique spells to strengthen your army.

Army

Archers, Element Towers, Soldiers, Rocket Towers, Machine Guns and Tanks. Each army has a different attack type and unique bonus effects for diversing your strategy.

Highlights


  • 6 army types and 77 realistic / futuristic towers with various effects and equipments
  • Miscellaneous type of enemies
  • Detailed tower information and statistics
  • Unlimited gameplay and different combinations
  • Leaderboards, Achievements, In-Game Purchases and Community
  • Upcoming new Maps and Enemy Pathfinding System
